scripts.start: echo "Noting to start. Run npm run build instead"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:minify && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:css: for D in test/*/; do echo "building css in ${D}"; mkdir ${D}build -p; tachyons ${D}index.css > ${D}build/build.css; done
scripts.build:minify: for D in test/*/; do echo "minifying css in ${D}"; mkdir ${D}build -p; tachyons ${D}index.css -m > ${D}build/build.min.css; done
scripts.build:docs: for D in test/*/; do echo "generating docs in ${D}"; tachyons ${D}index.css --generate-docs --package=../../${D}package.json > ${D}readme.md; done
scripts.build:clear: for D in test/*/; do echo "removing build css in ${D}"; rm -rf ${D}build && rm -rf ${D}readme.md ; done
